IdentifierHandler Class Reference
[APOXI Template Layer]

#include <Apoxi/Atl/IdentifierHandler.hpp>


Static Public Member Functions

static Feature * GetFeature (const WString &identifier)
static WString GetIdentifier (Feature *feature)
static Property * GetProperty (const WString &identifier)

Detailed Description

This class handles identfier strings, which reference either a property or a feature. Notation:
  • prop://<ApplicationID>/<FeatureID>
feat://<ApplicationID>/<FeatureID>

Member Function Documentation
